mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.groupid, a.number, a.userid, a.createtime, a.remark, a.print_status AS printStatus, a.start_num AS startNum, a.end_num AS endNum, c.uname, c.mobilephone, ( SELECT count(1) FROM barcode_tab b WHERE b.resourceid = a.id AND b.bindstatus != 10 ) AS total, d.group_name as groupName FROM resourcse_app_tab a LEFT JOIN user_tab c ON a.userid = c.id LEFT JOIN group_tab d on d.id = a.groupid WHERE a.company_id is null order by a.createtime desc

SELECT a.id, a.groupid, a.number, a.userid, a.createtime, a.remark, a.print_status AS printStatus, a.start_num AS startNum, a.end_num AS endNum, c.uname, c.mobilephone, (SELECT count(1) FROM barcode_tab b WHERE b.resourceid = a.id AND b.bindstatus != 10 ) AS total, d.company_name as companyName FROM resourcse_app_tab a LEFT JOIN user_tab c ON a.userid = c.id LEFT JOIN T_COMPANY d on d.id = a.company_id WHERE a.company_id is not null
and a.company_id = #{companyId}
and (#{startNum} BETWEEN a.start_num and a.end_num or #{endNum} BETWEEN a.start_num and a.end_num)
and #{startNum} BETWEEN a.start_num and a.end_num
and #{endNum} BETWEEN a.start_num and a.end_num
order by a.createtime desc
